title: On the web
full text:
SPECIAL SERIES
‘Weighing wellness’ series has extras online
A special three-part series written by Business Insurance Senior Editor Joanne Wojcik traces the history of the wellness movement from its initial inception through legal compliance hurdles and on to its slow adoption by companies trying to balance worker incentives with penalties. Read about these issues and check out related resources, at www.BusinessInsurance.com/wellness.
QUESTIONS & ANSWERS
Hear podcast interview with climate expert
Business Insurance’s interview of climate expert Evan Mills, staff scientist at the U.S. Department of Energy’s Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory, is offered in its entirety online at www.Business Insurance.com/QandA.
ONLINE EXECUTIVE FORUMtm
Terrorism comp risk webinar archived online
An archive of Business Insurance’s Nov. 14 Online Executive Forum "Workers Compensation: Protecting People in the Age of Terrorism" is available online. To view this webinar on demand, along with other archived forums, go to www.BusinessInsurance.com/webinars.
BI DIRECTORIES
Risk management consultants updated
Business Insurance has updated its Risk Management Consult-ants directory for 2007, which is now available online at www.BusinessInsurance.com/ directories.
